<Barna Hedenhös
1:
Text: Barna Hedenhös:  The story is set in the Stone Age and follows the Hedenhös family.
Triplets:<Barna Hedenhös
2:
--------------------
Text: Barna Hedenhös:  "Barna Hedenhös" is mostly known as a book series, but Almqvist also made an animated television series about the Hedenhös family that was broadcast on SVT in 1972.
Triplets:<Barna Hedenhös
3:
--------------------
Text: Barna Hedenhös:  Additionally, Almqvist made a comic version of the Hedenhös books for the comic book "Tuff och Tuss" during the 1950s; the comic version later was remade for the Pelle Svanslös children's comic book in the 1970s.
Triplets:<Barna Hedenhös
